title: Inability to send a Ticket, coutosy of a buggy H&S Riot Setup [does not allow me to log in]

replies.body:
It sounds like you haven't checked your email to verify your email address yet, which is why it keeps requesting a new verification email.

To answer your question, this isn't a feature at the moment, and I don't work on the team that designs sales or anything in the store, so I cannot speculate on if this is even possible. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
